text: "Back to Black" is a 2007 song by English jazz singer Amy Winehouse. It is the third single from her second and final studio album Back to Black. It went to number 8 in the United Kingdom and Switzerland, number 11 in Ireland, number 3 in Italy, number 1 in Greece, number 18 in the Netherlands and Germany, number 6 in Israel and number 56 in Austria. ==Track listings and formats== ;UK CD singleDiscogs.com - CD single #"Back to Black" – 4:00 #"Valerie" – 3:53 #"Hey, Little Rich Girl" – 3:33 #"Back to Black" ;UK limited edition white 7" singleDiscogs.com - 7" White Vinyl *Side A: #"Back to Black" – 4:00 *Side B: #"Back to Black" – 3:48 ;UK 12" maxi singleDiscogs.com - 12" single *Side A: #"Back to Black" – 6:12 #"Back to Black" – 6:15 *Side B: #"Back to Black" – 4:00 #"Back to Black" – 4:03 ;Digital single #"Back to Black" ;Digital download – Remixes & B-Sides EP #"Back to Black" – 3:49 #"Back to Black" – 4:03 #"Back to Black" – 3:01 #"Back to Black" – 3:53 #"Back to Black" – 6:03 ==References== Category:2007 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Soul ballads Category:Amy Winehouse songs Category:Beyoncé songs Category:Miley Cyrus songs Category:Soul songs Category:Funk songs Category:Ballads
